txt.en: The Stinging Bog lies in the midst of the route for Rohirrim merchant and soldier movement between the cites and outposts. Marsh-flies nest here, and their stings are more than a mere annoyance.

'You destroyed nests of the marsh-flies while in the Stinging Bog? That was good thinking, [placeholder], and above and beyond what I originally asked of you. It was thoughtful of you, and for that, I am impressed.'
The Stinging Bog lies in the midst of the route for Rohirrim merchant and soldier movement between the cites and outposts. Marsh-flies nest here, and their stings are more than a mere annoyance.
The Stinging Bog is on the far side of the road from the Feldburg.\n\nYou should destroy nests of the huge stinging marsh-flies in the Stinging Bog.
Speak with Captain Agelmund about the nests
Captain Agelmund is at Feldburg in the Wold.\n\nYou should speak with Captain Agelmund.
